name: Final Shift VR
description:
Thawed out of cryo after who knows how long, your biological brain is required for one final shift. Witness this experience using an Oculus Rift (Tested on the DK2 and retail).

Although classified as a game, it is more of a Virtual Reality Experience. No input required, except one keypress to start it. Thank you for watching, and if you've enjoyed it, feel free to leave a small tip!
